analysis.description:
Lottery.payWinner (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#193-200) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#196-197)

Lottery.payDev (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#201-207) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- dev.transfer(balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#204-207)

Reentrancy in Lottery.deposit (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#80-120):
	External calls:
	- poohContract.buy.value(msg.value)(customerAddress) (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#86-88)
	- poohContract.exit() (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#106-107)
	External calls sending eth:
	- poohContract.buy.value(msg.value)(customerAddress) (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#86-88)
	- payDev(owner) (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#109-110)
	- payWinner(customerAddress) (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#112-114)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ticketNumber (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#118)
	- winningNumber (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#118)

Lottery.deposit (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#80-120) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-poohContract.buy.value(msg.value)(customerAddress) (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#86-88)

Reentrancy in Lottery.deposit (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#80-120):
	External calls:
	- poohContract.buy.value(msg.value)(customerAddress) (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#86-88)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ticketNumber (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#98)
	- ticketNumber (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#119)

Reentrancy in Lottery.emergencyStop (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#157-167):
	External calls:
	- poohContract.exit() (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#162-164)
	External calls sending eth:
	- owner.transfer(balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#166)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- openToPublic (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#167)

Lottery.deposit (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#80-120) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- ticketNumber >= winningNumber (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#100-119)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '' of POOH.buy (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#235) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '' of POOH.myDividends (/unique_chucks/12/0xfb0513602b08ede66c28c128ece6a2f11161f17f.sol#239) is not in mixedCase
